alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton; Pope; Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 2:52PM CDT until April 15 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Southeastern Johnson County in western Arkansas... Northern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 251 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Holman, or 11 miles east of Clarksville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dover... Hector... Witts Spring... Broomfield... Moore... Solo... Smyrna... Holman... Lake Dardanelle... Ben Hur... Augsburg... Lutherville... Long Pool Campground... Piney Bay Recreation Area... Nogo... Treat... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Tilly... Scottsville... Simpson... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
